Content: A workshop 'Beauty Culture' was organised for women in military families and all woman soldiers, resident in 21 Division area and civilians living in Anuradhapura on 28 July. The programme was facilitated by one of the veteran beauticians, Ms Surangi Kodithuwakku by conducting lectures. In addition, all participants for this workshop were gifted with a set of beauty culture packs, sponsored by Off Marks PVT Ltd. The chief guest of the event was the General Officer Commanding of 21 Division Major General Kumar Jayapathirana. Senior Officers, Officers of the 21 Division and under command formations participated in the event.
